docblock.description: PHP Template
docblock.long-description:
Template Inheritance allows HTML views to manage themselves, saving the controllers from worrying about display logic. In short, inheritance in your templates offers the same decoupling benefits as standard PHP objects making it easier to manage presentation.

This class is more powerful than it looks.
